plot outline: Every year, on a particular date, a medical student goes missing from the institution named Samyuktha. As the mystery and dread surrounding this strange phenomenon grow by the day, a student sets out to investigate the disappearances. All the clues lead to an abandoned bungalow, but mortal danger awaits in the shadows for those who come there seeking answers.
